thread.section_title: Enchanting Travels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enchanting Travels | enchantingtravels.com
thread.title: Lizanne Gittins
thread.title_full: Enchanting Travels reviewed by Lizanne Gittins

author: Lizanne Gittins
title: Lizanne Gittins
text: Every part of our trip was planned and organised with great attention to detail. We were able to personalise the places we visited and had a great balance between time with a personal guide and time on our own to explore. Our driver was fabulous and nothing was too much trouble. He took particularly good care of our elderly parents which was greatly appreciated. Everything that we were promised was delivered and our travel agent checked in with us regularly to ensure everything was going well. We couldn't recommend Enchanting Travels highly enough and I will certainly be using them again when I next travel.
